intents.name: Change_operational_state
sampleUtterances: i want to jump in the shower can {Agent} turn {Device} {Operational_state}
i'd really like to take a shower could {Agent} turn {Device} {Operational_state}

intents.name: Motion
sampleUtterances: robot i need you in the bathroom go {Goal}

intents.name: Taking
sampleUtterances: i would like some beer can {Agent} grab {Theme} {Source}
